ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: dueling magicians
ygData.msgSnippet: ... since that ... aren t that ... well, exp loss is also not as bad as it once was. I died in the basement of /Kurn s Tower/ *winces at the thought* to a host
ygData.messageBody:
> I would say that having his pet kill him is a pretty jerk thing to do,
since that
> would cause him to lose experience. i would hope that people on this list
aren't that
> nasty that they would be advocating this.


well, exp loss is also not as bad as it once was. I died in the basement of
/Kurn's Tower/ *winces at the thought* to a host of very green Bucky
Badgers, it took less than an hour at the giant fort in the Frontier
Mountains to get that back and then some. Just a thought, I don't know what
it is like at other levels. Another ameliorating factor is that since he is
in your guild you will be able to make yourself available for his ensuing
exp-twinking needs *smile*

Tszaaz E'Taurguin, 32, Soi Disant Gentry, Povar
